14:51:49 SQL> ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss';

Session altered.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.00
14:51:49 SQL> 
14:51:49 SQL> 14:51:49 SQL> --
14:51:49 SQL> -- merge.sql
14:51:49 SQL> --
14:51:49 SQL> 
14:51:49 SQL> -- I use this script to merge data from ibs_stage into ibs5min.
14:51:49 SQL> 
14:51:49 SQL> 
14:51:49 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_old	  (tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
14:51:49 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_dups_old(tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
14:51:49 SQL> 
14:51:49 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.39
14:51:50 SQL> RENAME ibs5min TO ibs_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.06
14:51:50 SQL> 
14:51:50 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_dups_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.04
14:51:50 SQL> RENAME ibs_dups TO ibs_dups_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.04
14:51:50 SQL> 
14:51:50 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs_dups COMPRESS AS
14:51:50   2  SELECT
14:51:50   3  tkr
14:51:50   4  ,(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')+(epochsec/24/3600))ydate
14:51:50   5  ,clse
14:51:50   6  FROM ibs_stage
14:51:50   7  UNION
14:51:50   8  SELECT tkr,ydate,clse
14:51:50   9  FROM ibs_old
14:51:50  10  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:02.90
14:51:53 SQL> 
14:51:53 SQL> -- ibs_stage may have data outside of RTH.
14:51:53 SQL> -- Remove data which is outside of RTH:
14:51:53 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') < '14:30'AND ydate < '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.33
14:51:53 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') > '20:55'AND ydate < '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.28
14:51:54 SQL> -- Daylight savings time started on 2011-03-14:
14:51:54 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') < '13:30'AND ydate > '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.20
14:51:54 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') > '19:55'AND ydate > '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.20
14:51:54 SQL> 
14:51:54 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs5min COMPRESS AS
14:51:54   2  SELECT
14:51:54   3  tkr
14:51:54   4  ,ydate
14:51:54   5  ,AVG(clse)clse
14:51:54   6  FROM ibs_dups
14:51:54   7  GROUP BY tkr,ydate
14:51:54   8  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:02.82
14:51:57 SQL> 
14:51:57 SQL> ANALYZE TABLE ibs5min COMPUTE STATISTICS;

Table analyzed.

Elapsed: 00:00:05.06
14:52:02 SQL> 
14:52:02 SQL> -- I should see less than 60 min:
14:52:02 SQL> SELECT
14:52:02   2  tkr
14:52:02   3  ,(sysdate - MAX(ydate))*24*60 minutes_age
14:52:02   4  ,MIN(ydate)
14:52:02   5  ,COUNT(ydate)
14:52:02   6  ,MAX(ydate)FROM
14:52:02   7  ibs5min
14:52:02   8  GROUP BY tkr
14:52:02   9  ORDER BY tkr
14:52:02  10  /
